items.title: Scaffold TypeScript RLM memory observability architecture
acceptance: TypeScript strict Node.js project scaffolded with pnpm scripts
Three-tier RLM memory engine includes short-term buffer, observer loop, and reflector loop with context REPL
OpenTelemetry traces agent.generate, memory.observe, and tool.execute with required attributes
SQLite schema includes messages, observations, reflections, and traces tables
Demo entrypoint runs a simulated research agent conversation
items.notes: Implemented src/core, src/memory, src/telemetry, and src/storage scaffold with Result-based async flows and env validation.

items.title: Implement UTP as callable multi-agent pipeline
acceptance: Callable agents exist for Structural_Analyst, Abstract_Specifier, Domain_Specialist, and Variance_Detector
Orchestrator emits exactly five ordered UTP sections
Audit includes conformance test pass/fail and discrepancy mapping with patch instructions
items.notes: Added src/utp callable phase agents and orchestrator; entrypoint now prints UTP contract sections in order.

items.title: Implement UTP portability layer with CLI, harness, adapters, and CI conformance gates
acceptance: UTP core models and pipeline produce deterministic run artifacts in runs/<utc-iso>/
Tool harness supports schema validation, determinism, audit trail, and dynamic tool exposure
Four UTP phases have strict typed I/O and reality auditor emits discrepancies + patch instructions only
Raw and autogen adapters are available via UTP_ADAPTER switch
CLI/config/examples/tests/docs/CI conformance gating are added
items.notes: Added src/utp portability package with pipeline, harness middleware, adapters, CLI, docs, examples, tests, utp.toml, and CI test jobs.
